processio 1.0.0 API

Packages
org.greencheek.processio.agent This package contains the JavaAgent that kicks of the process of monitoring /proc/PID/io
for the amount of IO that is being performed by the current JVM process.
org.greencheek.processio.domain Stores the domain model objects that represent: CurrentProcessIO : Used to store temporarily the current io that has been obtain for the current process ProcessIO : Used to store the previous IO that has been recorded for the process, and the latest IO that has been recorded for the process
org.greencheek.processio.domain.jmx Contains the MXBean that is stored in the JMX Server, to obtain the ProcessIO obtain from the JMX Service as an atomic unit.
org.greencheek.processio.service.io Contains the classes that obtain the current read and write io for the given process.
org.greencheek.processio.service.persistence Contains the implementation that stores the current processes io into jmx.
org.greencheek.processio.service.persistence.jmx Contains the implementation of ProcessIOUsagePersistence that stores the current process's io into jmx.
org.greencheek.processio.service.pid Contains implementations that obtain the PID of the currently operating JVM process
org.greencheek.processio.service.scheduler Contains the implementation of ProcessIOScheduler that stores uses a single threads scheduled executor service that periodically reads the current process's io from a given ProcessIOReader and persists that result IO, if it is valid, using the given implementation of the ProcessIOUsagePersistence interface
org.greencheek.processio.service.usage Package that holds the implementations that are responsible for calculating the usage of the current JVM process by querying the ProcessIO object.
